intro.title: Introduction
intro.descrip1: Hello, I’m a full-stack developer passionate about creating elegant solutions to complex problems. My journey in software development began with curiosity about how websites work and evolved into a constant dedication to building useful, modern, and well-designed digital experiences.
intro.descrip2: I have primary experience in the frontend ecosystem, working with technologies such as React, Next.js, modern JavaScript, and responsive, accessible, high-performance UI design tools. I am also expanding into backend development with Node.js, APIs, databases, and cloud deployments, building a comprehensive vision of web development. I focus on writing clean, maintainable code and crafting interfaces that combine functionality, aesthetics, and strong user experience.
intro.descrip3: Beyond coding, I continue learning in a self-driven way, exploring new technologies, AI integrations, and development best practices. I enjoy tackling new challenges, continuously improving my skills, and collaborating on projects that create real impact.
